<bean id="@PROJECT_NAME@ServiceInfo" class="java.util.HashMap"> <constructor-arg> <map> <entry key="APPLICATION_SERVICE_BEAN" value-ref="@PROJECT_NAME@ApplicationService"/> <entry key="AUTHENTICATION_SERVICE_BEAN" value-ref="@PROJECT_NAME@AuthenticationManager"/> </map> </constructor-arg> </bean>
<bean id="@PROJECT_NAME@Interceptor" class="gov.nih.nci.system.client.proxy.ApplicationServiceProxy" singleton="true"> <property name="proxyFactory"> <bean class="edu.ualberta.med.biobank.client.BiobankProxyHelperImpl"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="@PROJECT_NAME@ApplicationService" class="org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="target"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/applicationService"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="@SERVICE_INTERFACE@"/> <property name="httpInvokerRequestExecutor"> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.GSIHttpInvokerRequestExecutor"/> </property> </bean> </property> <property name="interceptorNames" value="@PROJECT_NAME@Interceptor"/> <property name="interfaces" value="@SERVICE_INTERFACE@"/> </bean>
<bean id="@PROJECT_NAME@AuthenticationManager" class="org.acegisecurity.providers.ProviderManager"> <property name="providers"> <list> <bean class="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationProvider"> <property name="remoteAuthenticationManager"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/remoteAuthenticationManager"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationManager"/> </bean> </property> </bean> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.security.acegi.authentication.NullGroupNameAuthenticationProvider"/> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.security.acegi.authentication.NullX509AuthenticationProvider"/> </list> </property> </bean>
<alias alias="ServiceInfo" name="@PROJECT_NAME@ServiceInfo"/>
